name: utopia-map-e2e-testing
description: Cypress End-to-End Tests for Utopia Map

scripts.report:generate: marge results/merged-report.json --reportDir results/html --reportTitle 'Utopia Map E2E Tests' --reportPageTitle 'Utopia Map E2E Test Report' --inline --charts --showPassed --showFailed --showPending --showSkipped
scripts.report:full: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
